name: Songs2See
description: Songs2See is a fun and easy way to learn a musical instrument. It is the first music game that lets you play along to well known songs using real acoustic instruments. The only required hardware is a simple PC microphone and your instrument.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 8, Windows7, Windows Vista, Windows XP SP3 Processor: Intel ®Pentium ®4 2GHz or faster Memory: 1 GB RAM Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: Required
